description.value: Whether as a dealer or player, you've learned to spot cheaters. When another creature attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Conceal an Object] from you, use your Gambling Lore DC if it's higher than your Perception DC to determine whether they succeed. When you search a creature for a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] object, you can use Gambling Lore in place of Perception.
